doc.title: Ice Yachting
doc.plot: "This picture has been shown all over the world with immense success. The picture was taken on Lake Ontario, and our operator was singularly fortunate in getting a large number of very swift boats, and a number of daring maneuvers. One of the boats is put through the trick known as 'Spinning,' in the course of which the yachtsman is thrown out of the boat on the ice, on his head."
